collection:
Information We Collect

  * NFT Identifier, Name, or Number: When you use our service, you may input NFT identifiers, names, or numbers to search for NFT information.
We collect and process this information solely for the purpose of providing you with the requested information.
* User name, Password: When using our services, you might enter your username and password to manage information relating to you.
We collect and process this information solely for the purpose of providing you with the requested information.

Use of Information

The information collected is used for the purpose of performing the basic
functions of this application.

Sharing of Information

The information collected will only be used for the purpose of providing the
functionality of this application and will not be shared with third parties.

Data Security

The application takes reasonable precautions to protect the security of the
information it collects.
